name: Portfolio Website
description: A dynamic and responsive personal website built with SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS to showcase skills, projects, and professional experience. Features seamless light/dark theme switching and engaging animations.
achievements: Developed a fully responsive portfolio website using SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS, ensuring optimal viewing across devices and clean, utility-first styling.
Implemented modular and reusable Svelte components along with smooth scrolling and scroll-triggered animations using Intersection Observer to enhance user experience and maintainability.
Integrated dynamic light/dark theme switching with Mode Watcher to support accessibility and user preferences.
Deployed the application via Vercel for continuous integration and streamlined delivery workflows.
Created a custom resume generator using Typst, with both portfolio and resume powered by a shared JSON data source for easier updates and consistent presentation.
summary_achievements: Built a responsive portfolio website with SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS.
Implemented modular components, smooth animations, and theme switching.
Created a Typst-based resume generator using shared JSON data.

name: doc2pdf
description: A cross-platform Python-based tool that converts Microsoft Office documents to PDF using LibreOffice. It supports individual files, directories, and ZIP archives, maintaining directory structure in output and offering CLI options for flexibility. The tool optionally copies non-convertible files and supports multithreaded processing for improved performance.
achievements: Developed a versatile document conversion tool using Python on Linux, capable of handling multiple file formats including .ppt, .pptx, .doc, .docx, .xls, and .xlsx.
Implemented functionality to process files from various sources: individual files, directory trees with subdirectories, and ZIP archives.
Ensured preservation of original directory structures in the output, enhancing organization and user experience.
Integrated optional multithreading to improve performance during batch conversions, with configurable thread limits.
Provided flexible configuration through a centralized settings module, allowing users to customize behavior such as file copying and exclusion rules.
Designed a modular architecture promoting maintainability and scalability, separating concerns into distinct modules (e.g., converters, file utils, conversion logic).
Created both CLI and GUI interfaces, expanding accessibility and usability for different types of users.
Built and deployed a Docker image to enable usage without requiring local installation of Python or LibreOffice.
summary_achievements: Created a Linux-based Python tool for converting various document formats to PDF while preserving input structure.
Implemented support for processing files from multiple sources including directories and ZIP archives.
Offered both CLI and GUI interfaces, along with a Docker image option, to enhance accessibility.

name: Knit
description: Knit is a Flutter-based mobile application designed to foster community engagement and reduce social isolation by enabling residents to connect, chat, and organize neighborhood events easily.
achievements: Achieved A+ (4.0) in Mobile App Engineering module for the development of Knit app.
Developed a fully functional Flutter app with a modular codebase.
Implemented features for neighbor interaction, event organization, and onboarding of new residents.
Collaborated in a team setting to ideate and deliver a community-focused mobile solution.
summary_achievements: Achieved A+ (4.0) in Mobile App Engineering module.
Enabled real-time neighbor interaction and local event organization.
Collaborated effectively in a team to deliver a polished mobile experience.

name: J.I.M
description: Fitness-Oriented Chatbot designed to assist users in selecting appropriate exercises, warm-ups, and providing health-related information.
achievements: Contributed in achieving A+ (4.0) in Introduction to Artificial Intelligence module.
Achieved a 94.4% success rate in providing users with helpful and relevant information.
Assisted users in selecting exercises and warm-ups to target specific muscle groups.
Responded to health-related inquiries with accurate and reliable information.
summary_achievements: Achieved a A+ (4.0) in Introduction to Artificial Intelligence.
Developed a chatbot to assist users with exercise and health queries.
Achieved a 94.4% success rate in providing relevant information.

name: APU Programming Cafe
description: Coaching Class Application for Programming that includes user registration, deletion, and SQL database management.
achievements: Achieved A (3.7) in the Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming module using C#.
Designed and implemented the Administrator role, including user registration and deletion features for efficient user management.
Designed and optimized SQL database schemas, and implemented queries for effective data retrieval and manipulation.
summary_achievements: Achieved A (3.7) in Object-Oriented Programming using C#.
Developed admin features for user management.
Designed and optimized SQL database schemas.

name: Food Ordering System
description: An online food ordering system that allows customers to browse and place orders for various food types through multiple vendors.
achievements: Achieved A (3.7) in Object-Oriented Development with Java module.
Developed an online food ordering system with features such as user registration, order tracking, and notification integration.
Utilized text files for lightweight data storage.
Collaborated effectively in a team environment using Git and GitHub for version control and code management.
summary_achievements: Achieved A (3.7) in Object-Oriented Development with Java.
Developed an online food ordering system with user and order management.
